summary: CAR HAD NO ISSUES. WAS DRIVING AND ALL OF A SUDDEN OUT OF NO WHERE EVERYTHING IN CAR WAS FLICKERING ON AND OFF. SPEEDOMETER WAS GOING UP AND DOWN AND COULDN'T STEER CAR. THE SMELL WAS LIKE SOMETHING WAS ON FIRE. THOUGHT IT WAS BATTERY (EVEN THOUGH THERE WAS NO ISSUES BEFORE) BOUGHT A NEW BATTERY AND THE BURNING AND SMOKE WAS WORSE. COULDN'T EVEN DRIVE IT HOME. THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM W THIS VEHICLE YET THIS VIN ISN'T INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.
